mapper.select: select m_seq as mNo, mento_id as mentoId, mento_name as mentoName, mento_major as mentoMajor, mento_grade as mentoGrade, auth_status as authStatus, del_yn as delYn, mento_theme as mojorTheme, mento_comment as mentoComment from mento_tbl where m_seq = #{_parameter}
select * from file_tbl where file_divi = 'M' and ref_no = #{_parameter}

select * from (select rownum as rnum, m.* from (select m_seq as mNo, mento_id as mentoId, mento_name as mentoName, mento_major as mentoMajor, mento_grade as mentoGrade, auth_status as authStatus, del_yn as delYn, mento_theme as mojorTheme, mento_comment as mentoComment from mento_tbl)m) where rnum between #{start} and #{end} order by 1 desc
